    Happy Labor Day! Whether you're lucky enough to have a day off to celebrate or need to head to the office, you won't want to miss today's price drops. Tons of retailers are holding Labor Day sales ending tonight, so time is running out to save on furniture, tech, apparel, outdoor gear, and more.

    This weekend is a rare chance to score deals directly from retailers — something that Amazon's October Prime Day can't match up to. You might be surprised by just what you can find on sale for Labor Day this year. Some of my favorite sales include Amazon's discounted Echo devices, REI's holiday event, and Benchmade's sitewide sale. For even more great deals, check out my deal roundups for Allbirds, Blue Nile, Amazon, and Brooklinen.

    Keep scrolling to find some of the best Labor Day deals, from smart speakers to six-person tents. You can also find more of the holiday's promotions in our roundup of the best Labor day mattress deals.

    • Blue Nile: Save 40% on jewelry and 25% on ring-settings

    • Walmart: Get up to 65% off appliances, jewelry, and more.

Right now, I'm seeing a lot of great price drops on models we love and recommend in our guide to the best TVs, including Samsung, and Insignia displays. The best deals include almost $2,000 off the 65-inch Samsung S90C and 20% off Samsung's 2024 The Frame QLED TV.

    When is Labor Day?

    Labor Day 2024 officially arrives on Monday, September 2. 

    How long do Labor Day sales last?

    Most Labor Day sales end after Labor Day. A few may continue into the first week of September, but the best deals won't last long. If you see a deal you're interested in, be sure to act on it during the long weekend.

    For even more great savings, check out our roundups of the best Labor Day mattress sales and the best back-to-school sales.
